channel.title: BATCH file question
channel.description:
I am making a retard friendly ping machine for my friend so he can do it easily, but when i type it just exits i'm not sure why here is my code [code]@echo off title Something... cls echo Type P - To ping a website set /p p=Option: if %2%==c goto 1 if %1%==c goto 2 if %p%==c goto P if %P%==c goto p goto p :P title Ping Menu echo Type 1 For myspace ping, type 2 for youtube ping. pause goto 1 :1 title Myspace ping ping myspace.com pause goto 2 :2 title youtube ping ping youtube.com puase[/code]
also if this is wrong section tell me please.

item.title: BATCH file question
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=".Flair, post:2, topic:149075"]Replace:

@echo off title Pinging for Retards color 47 :P cls echo Type MySpace, YouTube, or Personal to choose the URL to ping echo. set /p pingwho=Failure: if %pingwho%==MySpace Goto MySpace if %pingwho%==YouTube Goto YouTube if %pingwho%==Personal Goto Personal :MySpace title Pinging MySpace.. echo. echo Pinging MySpace.. echo. ping myspace.com echo. pause Goto P :YouTube title Pinging YouTube.. echo. echo Pinging YouTube.. echo. ping youtube.com echo. pause Goto P :Personal echo. echo Type the website you'd like to ping echo. set /p PersonalWeb=Fail: echo. ping %PersonalWeb% echo. pause Goto P [/quote]
alright ty

Read full topic

item.title: BATCH file question
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Replace:

@echo off
title Pinging for Retards
color 47
:P
cls
echo Type MySpace, YouTube, or Personal to choose the URL to ping
echo.
set /p pingwho=Failure:
if %pingwho%==MySpace Goto MySpace
if %pingwho%==YouTube Goto YouTube
if %pingwho%==Personal Goto Personal
:MySpace
title Pinging MySpace..
echo.
echo Pinging MySpace..
echo.
ping myspace.com
echo.
pause
Goto P
:YouTube
title Pinging YouTube..
echo.
echo Pinging YouTube..
echo.
ping youtube.com
echo.
pause
Goto P
:Personal
echo.
echo Type the website you'd like to ping
echo.
set /p PersonalWeb=Fail:
echo.
ping %PersonalWeb%
echo.
pause
Goto P

Read full topic

item.title: BATCH file question
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

I am making a retard friendly ping machine for my friend so he can do it easily, but when i type it just exits iâ€™m not sure why here is my code

@echo off title Something... cls echo Type P - To ping a website set /p p=Option: if %2%==c goto 1 if %1%==c goto 2 if %p%==c goto P if %P%==c goto p goto p :P title Ping Menu echo Type 1 For myspace ping, type 2 for youtube ping. pause goto 1 :1 title Myspace ping ping myspace.com pause goto 2 :2 title youtube ping ping youtube.com puase

also if this is wrong section tell me please.
